target_competencies: Visual design proficiency (typography, color theory, composition)
UI/UX design and accessibility best practices
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, and Sketch
Production‑ready file preparation for print and digital
Adaptability to AI‑assisted design tools and emerging visual technologies
Feedback integration and iterative design process

questions: When tasked with developing a visual identity for an AI‑powered content platform, how would you ensure consistency across web, mobile, and print assets? What key steps and tools would you prioritize in this process?

Your portfolio showcases extensive work in branding and UI/UX. Can you describe a project where you integrated motion graphics into a static brand guideline, and what impact it had on the brand's digital storytelling?
What attracted you to NovaSynth Labs, and how do you see your experience with AI‑assisted design tools contributing to our product lab's mission?

transcript.content:
Welcome to your interview! 👋

We'll start with a few brief questions to better understand your background.
Please provide specific, detailed answers based on your experience.

Let's begin when you're ready.

When tasked with developing a visual identity for an AI‑powered content platform, how would you ensure consistency across web, mobile, and print assets? What key steps and tools would you prioritize in this process?
